title: Jump Up 3D: Basketball Game
description: Jump Up 3D is a sports basketball game where you shoot to get that slam dunk, but the one hitch is you're doing it by jumping on a trampoline. Not your ordinary basketball game, this one promises and delivers the excitement! Take aim, bounce on the trampoline, and score baskets before your opponent. With intuitive controls and addictive gameplay, it tests your precision and unleashes your inner dunk master.
instructions: The game's objective is simple—sink as many basketball shots as you can with a single click. In the first round, you're perched on top of a skyscraper, aiming for a single hoop. Press the spacebar to shoot when your trampoline jump is perfectly aligned for a slam dunk. The key to mastering this physics-based game is timing—wait for the perfect moment in your jump before hitting the spacebar to release the ball. Nail the shot, and you’ll be launched across the hoop.

title: Zombie Royale Io
description: Zombie Royale io is a collecting survival arcade IO game. With 3D cartoon survivors, you need to help them rescue more survivors and shoot down as many zombies as you can. As the time goes on, you will meet more and more strong zombies. They will come and chase the last survivors randomly. You can summon more soldiers and bombs in the game. After each round, you can use the gold coins to upgrade your survivors.
instructions: More game content requires you to explore, discover more fun and have fun.

title: Vampiric Roulette Romance
description: Experience Gothic romance in "Vampiric Roulette Romance"! Help the Vampire Prince choose a date for the eclipse night party from four stunning beauties. Dive into Gothic dress-up and makeup levels, and witness the suspenseful roulette revelation under the moonlit eclipse.
instructions: Tap/click to dress up and apply makeup. Enjoy the suspenseful roulette reveal!

title: Mega Ramp Bike Racing Tracks
description: Are you a real bike driver? Get this moto racing simulator from the bike simulator games and prove yourself as the best bike rider. Show your bike racing skills on the ramp in this unique bike driving game. It is the No.1 bike game from the free motorcycle games. Perform dangerous stunts on high sky impossible tracks and drive bike on crazy impossible tracks. Control the motorcycle in city superhero motorbike racer to become the ultimate bike rider.
instructions: Use W,A,S,D for player movement.

title: Money Grabber
description: In Money Grabber you collect Money before it goes into the Shredder! Upgrade your machines using cards in this survivor style tower defence game, you can unlock new cards using gems as a gacha mechanic and upgrade your machines using coins!
instructions: Tap/Click the cards to place and upgrade the machines!

title: Kitchen Sorting
description: Kitchen Sorting uses well known meachanics of ball and water sorting games. Sort cooking ingredients into glass jars right in your comfortable kitchen. When sorted, pour them into the pot a cook meals.
instructions: Tap jar to pick one or more ingredients of the same kind from the top. Tap another jar to drop them in. You can drop them only on top of the same kind of ingredients or into an empty jar. You can use swipe from source jar to destination one instead of taping. Sort all jars to complete the level.

title: Army Defence Dino Shoot
description: Army Defence Dino Shoot is a third-person defense idle game. It seems that a lot of dinosaurs surround you. To protect the base from incoming dinosaurs, you can summon more soldiers and engineers to create a defensive line. Don't forget to upgrade your weapons, damage, and fire rate skills. The longer you hold this position, the more dinosaurs you will meet. Have a good time building a military base.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Ultimate Sports Car Drift
description: Dive into the world of Ultimate Sports Car Drift and feel the rush of adrenaline as you take on the ultimate drifting challenges. Whether you're a seasoned pro or a newcomer to the world of drift racing, this game offers something for everyone. Buckle up, hit the gas, and let the drifting madness begin!
instructions: Use Arrow and WASD to drive R to reset

title: Animal Link
description: Animal Link is a puzzle game, the goal is to remove all the squares by eliminating the same pattern. The rules of the game are simple and require a certain amount of observation and quick reaction ability.
instructions: 1. Connection: Connect two lines with the same pattern 2. Turn: The cable changes direction at the turn 3. Obstacles: Other blocks block two lines of the same pattern 4. Countdown: You need to complete the level within the specified time, or the game will fail 5. Tips: If you can't find a matching square, you can use the tips function to get some help

title: Pop Culture Halloween Makeup
description: Immerse yourself in Pop Culture Halloween Makeup, where you can transform into your favorite icons. With a wide array of hairstyles, eyeshadows, mascaras, lipsticks, neck paint, tops, and accessories, you can create stunning Halloween makeup looks that will leave everyone in awe. Unleash your imagination, experiment with different styles, and become the ultimate makeup artist. Tap into the spirit of Halloween and play Pop Culture Halloween Makeup now to embark on a spooktacular journey!
instructions: Use your mouse to play this game on desktops or tap to play on mobile devices.

title: Shadow Fighter
description: It's a free side-scrolling role-playing fighting game. Shadow Fighter is perfect for you if you like ninjas, swordsmen, role-playing games, or fighting games. Compared with other RPG fighting games, this is an excellent PVP game. The game has two main modes: Solo Match and Team Mode. You can also view the leaderboard. In a Solo Match, you have to choose three heroes until one side is completely wiped out, that is, the other side wins. Don't worry about not having a favorite hero.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Bubble Shooter Witch Tower
description: Bubble Shooter: Witch Tower is a fun, free web game that takes you into a magical world of witchcraft. Ascend the Witch Tower by bursting as many bubbles as possible in this thrilling bubble-shooting puzzle adventure. Progress through levels, rescue adorable pets, and restore the Witch Tower piece by piece. With hundreds of enchanting bubble-shooting challenges, there's always something new to conquer. Play anywhere, anytime—no time limits!
instructions: Drag your finger to aim and shoot bubbles. Match 3 or more bubbles to clear them from the screen. Aim for 3 stars on every level! Use special boosters and bubbles to conquer tricky levels.

title: Football Penalty
description: Step into an exhilarating, never-ending penalty challenge! Show your opponents the power of your accurate shots and become a real football hero. Collect points for every target hit, progress through levels, and improve your football skills. Take part in a big tournament and get more rewards.
instructions: The game features unlimited penalty duels. Your goal is to shoot the ball at targets while avoiding obstacles like cones and boxes. Be quick and precise to earn more points and win trophies, which you can use to unlock new balls. There's also a big penalty tournament with even more prizes to win.

title: Girls Fun Nail Salon
description: Girls Fun Nail Salon is a fun Makeover game. This game is designed for girls who love fashionable nail art. This game not only has vivid sound effects and images but also smooth animations. Its gameplay is also very simple. You need to design nail art suitable for different customers, and they will give you scores, just like real customers. In the game, you can not only experience the fun of cutting and polishing nails but also the fun of designing fashionable nail art. Come and try it.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: GTA Car Rush
description: Rev up your engines and dive into the thrilling world of GTA Car Rush, a super fun and free-to-play car chase online game perfect for kids! In this exhilarating adventure, your mission is to collect all the money scattered across each level to unlock new and exciting challenges.
instructions: Use WASD or Arrow keys to drive. SpaceBar or letter K to shoot rockets.

title: Falling Blocks - Halloween Challenge
description: Step into the Halloween fun with Falling Blocks - Halloween Challenge, a thrilling match-3 arcade game! Match 3 or more spooky blocks, including pumpkins, ghosts, and skulls, as they rapidly fall from above. Your reflexes and strategy will be put to the test to clear the board and prevent a pile-up. Featuring vibrant Halloween visuals and addictive gameplay, this game provides hours of entertainment for all ages. Face the challenge, set high scores, and embrace the Halloween spirit!
instructions: On mobile: Touch on the screen where you want to place the block. On Desktop: Click on the screen where you want to place the block. --- OR --- Use Keyboard: - Use Left And Right Keys for move block left or right side - Use R for blocks refreshing - Use B for create bomb

title: Screw It Out Jam! - Matching Colored Screws
description: Welcome to Screw It!, a unique mobile puzzle platformer where screws are the key to solving intricate challenges. Strategically unscrew and reposition fasteners to shift, tilt, or collapse platforms in your favor. With simple tap controls and realistic physics, each level offers an addictive experience that tests your wits and reflexes. Dive into the world of Screw It! and master the art of unscrewing!
instructions: Start Playing: The game begins automatically. You’ll jump straight into the first level. Objective: Tap screws based on the color of the arriving toolbox. How to Play: When a toolbox arrives, check its color. Tap screws of the same color to screw them in. Finish the Level: Keep tapping until all screws are matched with the toolbox color. Tips: Pay close attention to toolbox colors to match screws correctly. Enjoy the game!

title: Idle Drive: Merge, Upgrade, Drive
description: Welcome to Idle Drive: Merge Upgrade & Drive! Unleash your creativity, craft a unique vehicle for travels. Start with a basic car, enhance it using in-game currency earned by tapping. Accumulate funds for components like engines and tires. Merge parts for higher levels, boosting speed and power. Visit the garage to customize your car. Idle DriftDrive offers exhilarating fun and satisfaction of creating your own ride. Perfect for car enthusiasts and racing fans. Exciting moments await you!
instructions: Simply tap on the screen and earn money! Use it to buy new parts, and then upgrade them by merging two parts of the same level.

title: Party Games Mini Shooter Battle
description: Party Games: Mini Shooter Battle is a battle-royale shoot-em-up game with 2D cartoon models. In 4 modes, you can shoot other players to earn scores for coins and gems. Then you can buy more roles and guns in the Shop. Your character can aim at the closest target automatically so that you only need to fire and dodge bullets from enemies. More kills and less death will make you claim more coin and gem rewards. Good luck!
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Trial Xtreme
description: Trial Xtreme is an exciting game in which you have to get a new experience from driving a motorcycle. Experience a sea of adrenaline while riding a motorcycle and passing 30 levels with dizzying and spectacular obstacles.
instructions: The player needs to go through the entire track from beginning to end, there will be many obstacles on the way, various jumps, obstacles, pipes, stones and everything in that spirit are painted in such a way that the user cannot pass the track without falls and difficulties. During the race, you need to collect as many stars as possible, depending on the collected stars, the next track will open for you.

title: Bouncy Blob Race: Obstacle Course
description: Bouncy Blob Race: Obstacle Course is an exciting physics-based racing game. Guide a bouncy blob through challenging obstacles with just one click. The blob will move in the opposite direction of the thrust. Maneuver through the course and beat your opponent to the finish line. Grab power-ups for an extra boost and secure victory in this thrilling race!
instructions: Tap/click to Thrust To Blob and the blob will move in the opposite direction of the thrust.

title: COINs
description: A line of 10 coins with the same number changes to a coin with one higher number. Coins can be moved anywhere, even to empty lines or on coins with different numbers. You can add coins at any time. The game is cleared if you make a coin with the number 10! The faster the clear time, the higher the score.
instructions: Tap to hold the coin and tap to place it.

title: Spin Shot Siege
description: In "Spin Shot Siege," take control of a gunner on a rotating tower. Enemy tanks orbit around you in the opposite direction. Each level has tanks following paths like diamonds, circles, rectangles, or triangles. Aim carefully and destroy all tanks before running out of ammo. Can you master the spin and win the siege?
instructions: Tap the screen to fire when a tank is in front of your gun. The tower rotates automatically, so aim and shoot at the perfect moment.

title: Limousine Car Game Simulator
description: Limousine car game free driving Welcome to the world of car game of Limousine 3d & car simulator 3d game of limousine. Enjoy the Limousine game of car driving in the city of cars game.limo car driving 2024 simulator mobile game taxi driving 2024 needs perfect driver to show skills. Collect maximum coins in the police jeep president limousine simulator to unlock luxury limo car game ? 3d 2024.
instructions: USE W,A,S,D for Player Movement.

title: Hoop World 3D
description: Hoop World 3D is a flip-and-dunk game that brings basketball to a whole new dimension! Get your timing right or you'll fall short of the net and fall flat on your face.
instructions: Hoop World 3D is fairly easy to maneuver and easy to learn. Use your mouse or keypad to control movement with just one finger.

title: Galactic Golf Solitaire
description: Enjoy a relaxing round of Golf Solitaire, a fun and easy-to-play card game. The goal is to clear the board by matching cards that are one rank higher or lower than the one on the discard pile. Don’t worry about suits—just focus on the numbers! If you’re stuck, you can draw from the deck to keep the game going. Play at your own pace and see how many rounds you can win. Perfect for a quick break or to unwind at the end of the day!
instructions: Objective: Clear the board by moving all cards to the waste pile. Setup: 7 columns of 5 face-up cards; the remaining cards form the draw pile. Gameplay: Click the card from the board to move it to the waste pile if it’s one rank higher or lower than the top card of the waste pile. Suits don't matter. Aces can be placed on Kings or Twos. If no moves are possible, draw a card from the draw pile. Win: Clear all cards from the board. Loss: No moves left, and the draw pile is empty.

title: Magic and Wizards Match
description: Magic and Wizards is an enchanting Match 3 game where you and your friend Aurora embark on a mystical journey through a magical realm. With over 4000+ levels, match gems representing magical elements to overcome obstacles, using powerful boosters to progress. Complete Daily Missions, tackle tricky blockers, and uncover hidden treasures. With stunning graphics and immersive gameplay, Magic & Wizards delivers a captivating experience filled with mystery. Ready for your magical adventure?
instructions: Combine more magical gems of the same kind to unlock powerful spells! Embark on an adventure through a mystical world with 4000+ levels. Join Aurora as you remove obstacles and cast spells to uncover hidden treasures. Watch out for magical creatures trying to hinder your progress! Enjoy daily missions, challenges, and discover enchanted rewards along the way. Experience endless fun and mystery in this captivating Match 3 game, Magic and Wizards!

title: Vega Mix: Sea Adventures
description: Vega Mix: Sea Adventures is an exciting three-in-a-row game with vivid effects and unique mechanics. Embark on an unforgettable adventure with brave heroes who find themselves on the seabed and explore a sunken ship and an ancient city. But their story does not end there — after that they will have to restore the ancient lighthouse on the island. Enjoy colorful levels, various bonuses and puzzles that will help you uncover the secrets of the depths of the sea and restore the lighthouse.
instructions: How to play match-3 puzzle: ● Match 3 or more pieces in a line to explode them. ● Match 4 pieces to create the Rocket. The Rocket blows up the whole line! ● Match 4 pieces to form a square to create the Spinner. The Spinner destroys one of the targets! ● Make a T-shaped match of 5 pieces to create the Bomb. The Bomb makes a massive explosion on the board! ● Match 5 pieces in a line to create the Rainbow Flower. The Rainbow Flower explodes pieces of the same color!

title: Academy Assault
description: Cael has decided to challenge Rin, the strongest in the academy that he goes to. She will only accept his challenge after he has defeated the other students in Imperium Academy.
instructions: - Press Space Bar to Strike! - To win a fight, you must react faster than your opponent by pressing spacebar before them in a simple standoff. - All of the academy members have something absolutely insane to say and your goal is to survive as many rounds as possible so you can face off against Rin, the strongest in the academy.

title: Merge Town!
description: Ever wanted to be Mayor? Ever wanted to run a town, develop the land, and see a metropolis grow? Well, look no further than Merge Town!, the newest title from Gram Games. The concept of the game is simple - you have a plot of land, and it’s your job to turn it into a town. Every so often, you’ll be gifted with a house. Each house can be merged with other houses of the same variety to form a bigger home.
instructions: Tap to play, click to merge

title: Sandstorm Covert Ops
description: Welcome to Sandstorm Covert Ops. As the leader of an elite team, your mission is to infiltrate a desert region controlled by a deadly terrorist organization. Navigate harsh terrains, gather crucial intelligence, and execute precise strikes to dismantle the enemy network.
instructions: - Left Mouse to Shot - Right Mouse button for Scope - E to Pick UP - 1,2,3,4,5 to change weapon

title: Ocean Kids Back To School
description: Welcome to Ocean Kids Back to school. It’s back to school time for these Kids. Can you help them get ready for their first day of classes? They’ll need to pick some cool outfits, new hairstyles, accessories, and school supplies too in this online dress-up and design game for girls. After you’re all done, help them to repair their vespa. Play and have fun!
instructions: Left Mouse button Click

title: Truck Simulator: Russia
description: In Truck Simulator: Russia you will drive a truck. As a driver, you will deliver cargoes to various cities and travel the open world. Unlock new types of goods to receive a greater reward for delivery. With the money you earn, you can buy a new truck or improve your trucks, as well as upgrade driver skills.
instructions: WASD or arrow keys to drive Space bar to use handbrake C to change camera view Q to lock cursor

title: Eye Art Perfect Makeup Artist
description: Eye Art Perfect Makeup Artist is a very sophisticated makeup game. This game has an eye makeup theme that is very targeted. This game has 26 levels, which means there are 26 types of eye makeup for you to choose from. No matter what style of makeup you prefer, you can find one that satisfies you in this game. Want to know more about this game?
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Battle Arena Race to Win
description: Battle Arena Race to Win is a high-octane arena game where you join the Red or Blue team and engage in fierce car battles. Choose from a variety of cars, collect and upgrade them to dominate the arena. Balance speed, durability, and acceleration to outmaneuver opponents. Equip your car with strategic items, upgrade for success, and climb the leaderboard to lead your team to victory!
instructions: W / up arrow key = accelerate S / down arrow key = move backward A / left arrow key = turn left D / right arrow key = turn right R = restore position Space = handbrake (drift) Left Shift = nitro

title: Mahjong Zen Garden
description: Do you like relaxing games? Or do you prefer a challenge? Try Mahjong Zen Garden and choose the way you want to play! *Hone your attention to detail and planning skills in this classic Chinese puzzle game by choosing the best mode for you. *120 unique campaign levels! *Show your skills and unlock Endless Mode! *Unique design with an Eastern atmosphere!
instructions: Make matching pairs to clear them from the table. You can only select tiles that are free on the left or right and not covered above. Your task is to gradually remove all the tiles from the board. Use boosters to help you out along the way. Classic Mode uses a timer, or you can play Meditation Mode if you don't want to be rushed. You can play Mahjong Zen Garden on all kinds of different devices and platforms: computers, smartphones, tablets, and even your TV! Good luck and have fun!

title: Zen Tile
description: Are you a master player of matching games? Do you enjoy matching puzzle games? Come to challenge this addictive puzzle game: Zen Tile - Relaxing Match!
instructions: - Tap 3 same tiles to eliminate them. - Match tiles from the screen. - Pay attention to the collecting bar; if fill it up, you'll fail. - Use boosters to help you solve tricky levels.

title: Jewel Garden Story
description: Enter a dazzling realm where sparkling jewels await your matching skills. Challenge yourself to achieve high scores and enjoy the visually stunning jewel combinations. Perfect for puzzle enthusiasts seeking endless entertainment.
instructions: The game features limitless puzzles. Connect three or more jewels of the same type to clear levels. Use 6 unique boosters to progress through the game faster. Earn rewards through daily logins and Garden Expeditions and aim for top rankings in the competitive leaderboard.

title: Reversi
description: Challenge your strategic mind against the computer in difficulty levels from absolute novice to expert in this classic game of flipping disks.
instructions: Take turns to place disks on the board, causing others to flip over. The player with more disks of their color visible at the end wins. More details are in the game.

title: Plug Man Race
description: Plug Head Race plays like a collecting arcade game with battery items. To win the level, you need to overpass the finish line in first place. Each platform requires a lot of red battery items, collect them, and use them to pass the current switch. When you are weaker than others, keep away from them and collect red battery items only. Remember to buy your favorite skins when you have enough gold coins.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play

title: Fillwords: Find All the Words
description: Fillwords: Find All the Words - the ultimate word search puzzle for intellectuals and word game enthusiasts! Find the hidden words in the grid of letters. Train your brain, boost your memory, and expand your vocabulary. Various Themes, every time different word combinations Enjoy a vibrant and intuitive interface Use hints Offline Play: Enjoy the game without the internet connection Vocabulary enrichment Suitable for all ages
instructions: Look for the given words in the grid of letters by connecting them in any direction: horizontally, vertically, or diagonally. Words may overlap or even go in the opposite direction. Use the mouse on a PC or touch controls on mobile devices.

title: Two Carts - Downhill
description: Two Carts - Downhill is a fast-paced arcade game where you control two carts simultaneously, each on its own obstacle-filled road. Use the left and right arrow keys to steer each cart independently, collecting components to score points. Pick up power-ups like Ice to slow down the game or Shield to protect against obstacles. As you progress, the game speeds up, challenging your reflexes and multitasking skills. How long can you keep both carts on track?
instructions: On PC: Use the left arrow to control the cart on the left and the right arrow to control the cart on the right You can control the carts by using the mouse clicking on the left or the right side of the game field. On Mobile: Tap the left or the right side of the screen to control the left or the right cart.

title: Robot Transform Race
description: Robot Transform Race is a running arcade game that is made of collecting, avoiding, and transforming elements. With 3D transformable robots, you need to win each race by collecting useful items, avoiding obstacles, and slowing down the other robots. Mostly you can strike and slow down the other robots nearby. Collect missiles to attach the advanced robots behind you. Don't forget to design your robot rather than buying a provided skin.
instructions: Mouse click or tap to play
